name: Infinite Damage
description:
You're fighting the ultimate evil: A greater demon from the underworld. There's no way you can defeat it by yourself -- you'll have to hire some friends.

Click the boxes on the right to buy more heroes to help you on your journey.

Click and drag the floating dice to throw them onto the tray.

Every number that you roll becomes money that you can spend on more heroes. Level up your heroes and your dice trays for score multipliers, and reach the elusive D-Infinity!

We made all models, the majority of textures, and some of the sounds on our own. Here are the assets we did not create:

MusicMenu SFXCardboard Texture
Leather Texture
Dragon Scales Brush
